component.name: Plausible
component.summary: Simple and privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics

description.p: Hybrid native + web app for Plausible Analytics, the lightweight and open-source website analytics tool. This app wraps the Plausible web app in a native UI, integrating better with desktop operating systems. Native features include:

ul.li: Icon in your Applications Menu, Dock, etc.
Native header bar with buttons for account settings and logging out
Save and restore current view, size, and position when closed and opened
Two-finger swipe to go back/forward between views
Zoom in/out with Ctrl+Plus/Minus, and it's remembered the next time you use the app
Slimmed down web app UI (no header or footer with external links)

description.p: Save and restore state when closed and opened
